pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detecting Gene Probes with Different Means or Variances Between Two Groups // A collection of functions to detect gene probes with different means or variances between two groups in (epi)-genomic data analysis, including classical F test and Levene's test for equal variance, likelihood ratio test for equal mean and equal variance, the wrappers for functions in R Bioconductor package 'missMethyl' (Phipson and Oshlack (2014) doi:10.1186/s13059-014-0465-4), the implementation of the methods proposed by Ahn and Wang (2013) https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3621641/, and the improved Ahn and Wang's methods that we proposed recently (Qiu and Li et al. (2017) http://oprscience.com/wp- content/uploads/2016/07/new-score-tests-for-equality-of- variances-in-the-application-of-dna-methylation-data- analysis.pdf).
